column4: News;Phnom Penh: An injured foreigner (Turkish) sat outside the Turkish embassy after claiming he was beaten up and robbed at 11 pmÂ January 8
column7: in front of the Turkish Embassy in Chaktomuk Sangkat
column8: Daun Penh district.------Daun Penh authorities said that before the incident
column9: people said the Turkish man who is aged between 34 and 35 years
column10: and unidentified was acting strangely.  The Turkish man sustained  wounds on his arms
column11: after having fallen to the ground.------People then reported to the authorities
column12: trying to help the Turkish man
column13: as he had no money to go to hospital and wanted his embassy to help him.------After the incident the man requested $15 from his embassy. The embassy agreed and transported him to his hotel to rest and recuperate. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/763979.html
